name: Planet X-47
description:
Welcome Astronaut To planet X-47

Sadly you were aboard a Spaceship that crash landed.

You will have to survive and find the parts missing for your space ship to return to earth but sadly that wont be easy. A whole alien race will be between you and your home and with your expiring oxygen and scrapy weapons the job will be hard.

But before you enter here is some information

W-A-S-D To Move

Shift To Dash 

Use Your mouse to scroll in between weapons and attack

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

There will be 7 weapons which you will unlock during the game

The Rifle   , Stun Grenade  , Grenade 

An Axe      , Shotgun   , Boost  and a Drone 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
